website_summaries.verdict: This is a mini refrigerator from a highly regarded manufacturer. It could serve as a supplemental refrigerator in a home or cold storage in an office.
pros: Clean interior look with glass shelving and clear crisper
cons: Storage space is only 3.1 cubic feet
not suitable as a primary refrigerator

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: This fridge does not get down to safe temperatures in the refrigerator section even on max cold. The fridge is in a room that is consistently ~72°F, the unit is not enclosed, and it is far from the wall. It is not overstuffed at all, and this is after days of not adding anything warm or taking anything out. I measured internal temperature of jelly after days of equilibration with a very precise thermapen, and it is at 43°F. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Dented door
customer_reviews.text: Got this fridge yesterday. After plugging it in, I could see two dents in the front door. I want to return it for a replacement, but repackaging a refrigerator in the box it came in just isn’t really possible since some of the packing doesn’t work after you take it out. I’m also sure I wouldn’t be able to lug it outside again for a pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Henry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no damages. Unit runs very quietly & freezer is very cold! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something for my bedroom that was quiet and had a decent size freezer. It has an okay crisper size drawer and soda dispenser. I have no complaints. Nice refrigerator. No shipping damage. I've had it for two months now and everything is good and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Huth

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: My mother will use it in her retirement community apartment. loves the lite on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ski bum

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It works well, fast shipping, no dents, inside light a plus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good.
customer_reviews.text: For Rec Room, but good for overflow. Just has one rattle on back when compressor running.
customer_reviews.author: Some thoughts

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great size and fit for my room. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Delvin Hill

customer_reviews.title: Hack to keep food from touching the back wall and freezing
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness...after having this fridge for nearly two years, (and I LOVE it, by the way), I just figured out how to keep items from touching the back wall of the fridge. (Because they will freeze if they touch it.) Take a lid from one of those plastic shoebox storage containers and simply slide it behind the shelves!! (Top facing you) it will create air pocket between the back wall and your food.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Varenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Runs perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost a month now and it runs like a dream. It keeps a constant temp which is vital for insulin. It is almost absolutely silent. I have to stick my ear on the fridge to hear if it is running. I love that the freezer is separate. It looks, feels, and runs like a proper large household fridge! Arrived in perfect condition. Don't waste your time on looking any further for a mini fridge, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Freezer quit after one month
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about this little frig - until the freezer quit working after a month. Returned it, which was a hassle since I’d already trashed the box.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love the freezer on this, plus plenty of room in the fridge. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Worst delivery ever
customer_reviews.text: The product was left in snow and rain for I don’t know how long. If the intention was to make sure that the fridge does not work, why should you even sell it to us.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen C

product_meta.title: GE GDE03GGKBB Freestanding Compact Refrigerator, 3.1 Cu Ft, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackGE GDE03GGKBB 19" Freestanding Compact Refrigerator with 3.1 cu. ft. Capacity, Energy Star, Separate True-Freezer Compartment, Clear Crisper, Can Rack, and Partial Automatic Defrost, in Black
feature_bullets: 3. 1 cu. ft. capacity ENERGY STAR double-door compact refrigerator
Separate true-freezer compartment - 0. 93 cu. ft. freezer capacity gives you room to store frozen foods
Interior lighting - Automatically illuminates when the fresh-food door is open
Clear crisper - Provide the ideal storage environment for fruits and vegetables
Glass shelves - Creates convenient food storage with easy-to-clean shelves
Door shelves - Small containers and boxes are easy to find in separate door areas
Can rack - Soft drink cans are within easy reach for quick access
Tall bottle door storage - Tall bottle storage frees up valuable shelf space
Partial automatic defrost - Fresh food section is frost-free with a manual defrost freezer
Recessed handles - Recessed handles make opening and closing the doors simple
